permissions.name: Can View
permissions.description: Allows users to view and browse all uploaded videos.

permissions.name: Can Add
permissions.description: Permits users to upload new videos.

permissions.name: Can Change
permissions.description: Grants users the ability to modify video.

permissions.name: Can Delete
permissions.description: Enables users to remove videos from the platform.

permissions.name: Can View
permissions.description: Allows users to view scheduled or past live streams.

permissions.name: Can Add
permissions.description: Permits users to create new live streams.

permissions.name: Can Change
permissions.description: Grants users to modify live stream.

permissions.name: Can Delete
permissions.description: Enables users to remove live streams from the platform.

permissions.name: Can View
permissions.description: Allows users to view staff/admins and their roles.

permissions.name: Can Add
permissions.description: Permits creation of new staff users and assign roles.

permissions.name: Can Delete
permissions.description: Enables removing or deactivating staffs and roles.

permissions.name: Can View
permissions.description: Allows users to view player preferences.

permissions.name: Can Change
permissions.description: Grants users to modify player preferences.
